item.description: Hi! I’m an undergraduate at Yale University studying Mathematics and Economics. In case you’d like to learn a bit about me, feel free to look here. In case you’re interested in the code underlying the site, feel free to check out the source code for the main site and the article page. If you’d like to get in contact to ideate or collaborate, please do! Contact me at joshua.mv.purtell@gmail.com UNDER CONSTRUCTION

item.title: Paper Roundup Week of October 9
item.description: It’s time for the weekly paper roundup! My hope is for this segment to roughly reduplicate the write-ups I build on Obsidian. Generally speaking, the inclusion of a paper on the roundup is not an endorsement, and the amount of text I devote to a given entry is only a noisy indicator of the value I ascribe to it. With that being said, let’s jump in. On Spectral Clustering: Analysis and an Algorithm
